title: The BEST Full Tower Cases - O11 XL vs Enthoo 719 (Luxe 2)
description: The Lian Li O11 XL and Phanteks Enthoo Luxe 2 (now called the 719) both hope to the the best full tower case for gaming and water cooled PCs.  They have tons of space and features like dual system compatibility but is either one the winner?      Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Lian Li O11-XL:   Lian Li O11 Dynamic:   Enthoo 719:    Check out the new Razer Blade 17 Pro:   Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is sponsored by Razer. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.  Both of these companies are advertisers with Hardware Canucks.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  ------------------------------------------------------- #phanteks719 #bestfulltowercase #o11xl #hardwarecanucks
